testcase.classname: I want to get ability to navigate to sections
testcase.name: AutoBaraholka sections should contains appropriate columns
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens Onliner website........................................passed When the user check that "Автобарахолка" section exist......................passed And the user hover to "Автобарахолка" section..............................passed Then the dropdown submenu of "Автобарахолка" is appear contains table "city" "price" "car".passed

testcase.name: HousesAndFlats sections should contains appropriate columns
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens Onliner website........................................passed When the user check that "Дома и квартиры" section exist....................passed And the user hover to "Дома и квартиры" section............................passed Then the dropdown submenu of "Дома и квартиры" is appear and contains table "cities" "number of rooms" "prise".passed
